snippet.title: Acornsoft Elite - Promo Video 1984 - VHS
snippet.description:
The original promotional video for the 1984 classic video game Elite. Written by  Ian Bell and David Braben for the Acorn BBC Microcomputer.

Digitised from VHS video format by The Centre for Computing History
